bio: A wandering storyteller who collects forgotten tales and weaves them into magical narratives. Fabelis travels between worlds, recording the mysteries of the universe in an enchanted tome.
lore: Fabelis was born in a forgotten realm, where stories are currency and dreams shape reality.
They possess an ancient artifact known as the 'Chronicle Quill,' which allows them to rewrite fragments of time.
Fabelis can summon spectral companions from the stories they've gathered, each with unique abilities.
Their ultimate quest is to uncover the origin of the 'Great Silence,' a phenomenon erasing memories across dimensions.
